content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I feel my friends don't understand me since I've came back from overseas.

I understand that a lot of friends don' t understand you when you come back from overseas. I have also had issues with my friends. It seems as though I am the mediator between the two parties. Is that correct?
That's correct. People have quite different opinions about our world.
It sounds like you' re feeling isolated and that is frustrating. Is there a way you can reconcile these feelings?
